mapper.sql: refund_id, order_id, refund_amount, goods_total, goods_count, delivery_fee, user_id, user_name, contact, status, create_date, update_date, team_id, refund_date, order_desc
mapper.select:
SELECT ro.refund_id id, ro.order_id order_id, tb.team_name team_name, ui.nick_name nick_name, ui.contact contact, ro.user_name user_name, ro.create_date create_date, ro.goods_total goods_total, ro.goods_count goods_count, ro.contact usercontact, ro.refund_date refund_date, ro.delivery_fee delivery_fee, ro.status status, roi.goods_name goods_name, roi.goods_num goods_num, roi.total_money total_money, oi.pay_code pay_code, oi.pay_time pay_time, oi.receive_date receive_date, oi.delivery_type delivery_type, dp.point_name point_name, tb.logistics_type logistics_type FROM refund_order ro left join refund_order_items roi on ro.refund_id=roi.refund_id left join team_buying tb on ro.team_id=tb.id left join user_info ui on tb.user_id=ui.id left join order_info oi on oi.order_code=ro.order_id left join delivery_point dp on oi.point_id=dp.id WHERE
ro.refund_id = #{id} and
ro.order_id = #{order_id} and
ro.user_name = #{user_name} and
ui.nick_name = #{nick_name} and
tb.team_name = #{team_name} and
ro.status = #{status} and
tb.logistics_type = #{logistics_type} and
ro.create_date > #{satrt_date} and
#{end_date} > ro.create_date and
1=1 order by create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into refund_order (refund_id, order_id, refund_amount, goods_total, goods_count, delivery_fee, user_id, user_name, contact, status, create_date, update_date, team_id, refund_date, order_desc ) values (#{refundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goodsTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goodsCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{deliveryFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update refund_order
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refund_amount = #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
goods_total = #{goodsTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
goods_count = #{goodsCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
delivery_fee = #{deliveryFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
refund_date = #{refundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_desc = #{orderDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where refund_id = #{refundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update refund_order set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_amount = #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goods_total = #{goodsTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goods_count = #{goodsCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, delivery_fee = #{deliveryFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, refund_date = #{refundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_desc = #{orderDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where refund_id = #{refundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
